mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction(tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_data, dlvy_date) VALUES (seq_transaction_tran_no.nextval, #{purchaseProd.prodNo:NUMERIC}, #{buyer.userId:VARCHAR}, #{paymentOption:CHAR}, #{receiverName:VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone:VARCHAR}, #{divyAddr:VARCHAR}, #{divyRequest:VARCHAR}, 2, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{divyDate:DATE},'YYYY-MM-DD') )
mapper.select: SELECT tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_data, dlvy_date FROM transaction WHERE tran_no =#{value}
SELECT tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_data, dlvy_date FROM transaction WHERE prod_no=#{value}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT t.tran_no, p.prod_no, t.order_data, t.tran_status_code, t.buyer_id, t.receiver_name, t.receiver_phone FROM transaction t, product p, users u WHERE t.prod_no = p.prod_no AND t.buyer_id = u.user_id AND t.buyer_id = #{buyerId} ORDER BY tran_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.currentPage}*#{search.pageSize} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN (#{search.currentPage}-1)*#{search.pageSize}+1 AND #{search.currentPage}*#{search.pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT t.tran_no, p.prod_no, t.order_data, t.tran_status_code, t.buyer_id, t.receiver_name, t.receiver_phone FROM transaction t, product p, users u WHERE t.prod_no = p.prod_no AND t.buyer_id = u.user_id AND t.buyer_id = #{buyerId} ORDER BY tran_no ) countTable
